return_description: A user-readable string representing the date.

Methods.method_description: Creates and returns an ISO 8601 formatted string representation of the specified date.

return_description: A date object, or nil if no valid date was found.

Methods.method_description: Creates and returns a date object from the specified ISO 8601 formatted string representation.

return_description: A user-readable string representing the date.

Methods.method_description: Creates a representation of the specified date with a given time zone and format options.

Vars.var_description: Options for generating and parsing ISO 8601 date representations. See ISO8601DateFormatter.Options for possible values.
The time zone used to create and parse date representations. When unspecified, GMT is used.

class_description: The ISO8601DateFormatter class generates and parses string representations of dates following the ISO 8601 standard. Use this class to create ISO 8601 representations of dates and create dates from text strings in ISO 8601 format.
